patchDescription: Force the game to read input from our fake input not BIOS_P1CURRENT

description: Have it read the fake input and real input, and OR them together
patchAsm: move.b $10fd97, D0 ; load the real changed input at BIOS_P1CHANGE
andi.b #$10,d0 ; wipe out anything that isnt the A button
move.b $108584, D1 ; load our fake input into D1
or.b D1, D0; combine the fake left/right with real A
